content: इरा [इ-रन् <ls>Uṇ. 2. 28</ls>; इं कामं राति रा-क वा <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} The earth. {@--2@} Speech. {@--3@} The goddess of speech, Sarasvatī. {@--4@} Water. {@--5@} Food. {@--6@} Spirituous liquor. {@--7@} Any drinkable fluid; a draught (especially of milk). {@--8@} Refreshment, comfort (<ab>Ved.</ab> in the last three senses).
